title: Dev Update 01 Posted
details: Greetings, I am Matheus Revoredo, Lead Game Designer of the Age of Chains game and would like to talk a little about our upcoming game!

title: Launched New Responsive Landing Page
details: Our first landing page has launched, designed by Matthew Reichardt <matthewjames3@protonmail.com>.

title: Launched GUARDIANCARD purchases via Swapbot
details: Being the first card within the game, Woodcoin's Guardian seeks to protect his fellows by using knowledge of millenia. Woodcoin's Guardian will be among the most powerful and rarest cards available for the game.
